```{r setup}
library(parlrdev)
```

```{r}
n1 <- 500; n2 <- 500
K <- 2
n1_vec <- rep(n1/K, K)
n2_vec <- rep(n2/K, K)
overlap_vec <- c(125, 125)


m1 <- c(.05, .95, .05, .95, .05, .95, .05, .95, .05, .95)

u1 <- c(.99, .01, .99, .01, 
        1 - 1/30, 1/30, 1 - 1/12, 1/12, 1 - 1/15, 1/15)

m2 <- c(.05, .95, .8, .2, .05, .95, .05, .95, .05, .95)

u2 <- c(.99, .01, .99, .01, 
        1 - 1/30, 1/30, 1 - 1/12, 1/12, 1 - 1/15, 1/15)

m <- rbind(m1, m2)
u <- rbind(u1, u2)

levels <- c(2, 2, 2, 2, 2)
varying_fields <- c(3, 4)

iter <- 5
S <- 200; burn <- S * .1
m_prior <- u_prior <- rep(1, dim(m)[2])
alpha <- beta <- 1
EVAL.SAMPS5 <- array(NA, dim = c(iter, 3, 2))

for(i in 1:iter){
comparisons <- SimulateComparisonsLC(m, u, levels, varying_fields, n1, n2, n1_vec, n2_vec, overlap_vec)
Ztrue <- comparisons[[5]]

Zchain <- BRACS_BK(comparisons, m_prior, u_prior, alpha, beta, S, burn)
Zhat <- BRL::linkRecords(Zchain, n1, 1, 1, 2, Inf)
eval <- GetEvaluations(Zhat, Ztrue, n1)
EVAL.SAMPS5[i, ,1] <- eval

Zchain <- BKSimple(comparisons, m_prior, u_prior, alpha, beta, S, burn)
Zhat <- BRL::linkRecords(Zchain, n1, 1, 1, 2, Inf)
eval <- GetEvaluations(Zhat, Ztrue, n1)
EVAL.SAMPS5[i, ,2] <- eval
print(i)
}
EVAL.SAMPS5

```
